name: IQ
desc:
Everipedia was founded in 2014 as a decentralized alternative to Wikipedia. Compared to Wikipedia, the platform allows unrestricted topics, a broader range of citation sources, and a content review process that enables more users to participate. Everipedia has also launched PredIQt, a decentralized prediction market, which enables users to predict the outcome of future events.
Everipedia is the largest English encyclopedia with more than six million entries, including all Wikipedia English entries.
Everipedia is available in English, Spanish, Korean, and Chinese languages.
IQ is the first EOS token available for trading on Binance.
